sentences.en: We are talking about a multi-deity society.
sentences.cn: 我们讨论的是一个多神崇拜的社会。

sentences.en: The "simple faith in the Deity" expressed in my teenage essay has faded over the years.
sentences.cn: 我在短文中表达的“对神的朴素的信念”已经慢慢随着年华淡去。

sentences.en: Since his death, various occult organizations have adopted him as a model figure or even as a powerful deity.
sentences.cn: 自从他死后，各种各样的神秘组织把他当作模范甚至是一个强大的神。
